thread.title: Rohan Mehra-Kanchi Singh and Kishwer Merchantt-Suyyash Rai turn down 'Nach Baliye 8' - Entertainment
thread.title_full: Rohan Mehra-Kanchi Singh and Kishwer Merchantt-Suyyash Rai turn down 'Nach Baliye 8' - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Rohan Mehra-Kanchi Singh and Kishwer Merchantt-Suyyash Rai turn down 'Nach Baliye 8' - Entertainment
text:
A post shared by Kanchi Singh (@kanchisingh09) onFeb 13, 2017 at 12:00pm PST
 
After a stint in Bigg Boss, TV actor Rohan Mehra was offered Nach Baliye. It seems the actor and his girlfriend, Kanchi Singh, were being considered for the couple dance reality show, but he turned down the offer.
Rohan says, "Yes, we were approached and it was tempting as I would have got to spend more time with Kanchi and work on my dancing skills as well. But we decided against it because I have just come out of one reality show and didn't want to jump into another so soon."
  A post shared by Kishwer M Rai (@kishwersmerchantt) onFeb 13, 2017 at 3:52am PST
 
Another popular TV couple, Kishwer Merchantt and Suyyash Rai, who tied the knot last year, have also rejected the offer to appear in 'Nach Baliye 8'. Kishwer Merchantt took to Twitter to confirm the development. Here's what she tweeted:
For all those asking..We were in talks but no we are not doing #NachBaliye8 ðÂÂÂ 
Gmrng pplðÂÂÂ off to shoot today after a long time #filmcity ðÂÂÂ
— Kishwer M Rai (@KishwerM) February 21, 2017 (With inputs from The Hitlist Team) 

Also read:  It's confirmed! 'Ghulaam' actor Vikkas Manaktala and wife Gunjan to be part of 'Nach Baliye 8'
